LanguageData.FoundedCult.label: founded the local cult
LanguageData.FoundedCult.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] is writing passionately upon a leatherbound tome.
LanguageData.FoundedCult.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] has [pawn_possessive] eyes closed and is uttering words in unearthly tongues.
LanguageData.FoundedCult.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] is smiling with grim joy.
LanguageData.FoundedCult.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] seems to have no idea what [pawn_pronoun] is doing.
LanguageData.FoundedCult.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] is shivvering with [pawn_possessive] eyes closed, fearful of [pawn_possessive] discovery.
LanguageData.FoundedCult.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->A nearby [animal] is staring, locked on [pawn_objective] with grim and hateful eyes.
LanguageData.ObservedNightmareTree.label: observed nightmare tree
LanguageData.ObservedNightmareTree.rulePack.rulesStri: tale_noun->the time [pawn_nameShortDef] observed an eerie tree
image->[pawn_nameFull] gazing up into the dark branches of an otherworderly tree carved with horrific symbols [circumstance_group]
desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] seems totally unaware of what is around [pawn_objective].
desc_sentence->[pawn_possessive] face itself seems to be twisted unnaturally.
LanguageData.ObservedNightmareMonolith.label: observed monolith
LanguageData.ObservedNightmareMonolith.rulePack.rules: image->[pawn_nameFull] stared up the otherworderly monolith that stretched into the clouds [circumstance_group]
desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] seems totally unaware of what is around [pawn_objective].
desc_sentence->[pawn_possessive] face itself seems to be twisted unnaturally.
LanguageData.HeldSermon.label: held sermon
LanguageData.HeldSermon.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[pawn_nameFull] stood at the pulpit to deliver a sermon [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.HeldSermon.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] foresaw the end of the world.
LanguageData.HeldSermon.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: desc_sentence->[pawn_possessive] mouth hung open, limp, as otherworldy tentacles reached out behind [pawn_objective].
LanguageData.HeldSermon.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] is being puppeteered by an indescribable creature looming above the temple.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellOrbitalInsanityWave.label: orbital insanity wave
tale_noun->the time Cthulhu caused a ship to crash from the skies
image->Cthulhu, perched atop a grand spire, casts a great claw outwards and a ship begins to fall from the sky
desc_sentence->Escape pods open to screaming individuals driven to absolute madness.
desc_sentence->Blood and unearthly tentacles writhe among injured escapees bursting from the pods of their madness-stricken vessel.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBountyOfTheSea.label: bounty of the sea
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBountyOfTheSea.rulePack.rules: tale_noun->the time a seaworthy ship dropped from the skies
image->A massive portal opens from the sky, reflecting an entire ocean behind it, as an entire ship full of living souls falls through
circumstance_phrase->to the horror of everyone present
circumstance_phrase->to the glee of the spectators
desc_sentence->The ship plunges into the ground, sending dozens of people sprawling to get their bearings.
desc_sentence->Inside it are countless modern treasures guarded by worried deckhands.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFertilityRitual.label: fertility ritual
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFertilityRitual.rulePack.rule: tale_noun->the time Shub-Niggurath gave us a fertility totem
image->The Black Goat Mother writhes with a thousand tentacles
circumstance_phrase->and from her maw is unhinged a hideous idol
circumstance_phrase->from the earth as a totem grows from the corpse of the sacrifice upon the altar
desc_sentence->The totem appears like a neolithic carving.
desc_sentence->Behind the prominent goat skull of the totem lies a field of corpses soaking the ground in ooze.
desc_sentence->The Black Goat Mother stares with burning eyes at the executioner.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellMotherOfGoats.label: mother of goats
LanguageData.Cults_SpellMotherOfGoats.rulePack.rulesS: tale_noun->the time a herd of black goats came
image->The Black Goat Mother writhes with a thousand tentacles
circumstance_phrase->upon the horizon as countless black goats gallop towards the colony.
circumstance_phrase->from the earth as a thousand black goats sprout from her appendages fully-formed
desc_sentence->The goats' maws open to reveal tentacled tongues.
desc_sentence->Some goats are standing on two legs.
desc_sentence->The Black Goat Mother stares with burning eyes ready to command her children.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPsionicGrowth.label: psionic growth
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPsionicGrowth.rulePack.rulesS: tale_noun->the time [pawn_nameFull] was gifted with psychic powers
circumstance_phrase->cuts into [pawn_nameShortDef]'s skull with tentacle hooks
desc_sentence->[pawn_nameShortDef]'s skull is enlarged to the point where [pawn_possessive] head can barely support itself upon [pawn_possessive] shoulders.
desc_sentence->Behind them writhe countless tentacles in the background.
desc_sentence->Colossal basalt towers appear behind the ripple of reality separating the Cthulhu from this realm of reality.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellRatsInTheWalls.label: rats in the walls
LanguageData.Cults_SpellRatsInTheWalls.rulePack.rules: image->thousands of rats pouring out of the walls
desc_sentence->They claw at one another as they collide.
desc_sentence->Even more are erupting from the floor during the chaotic scene.
desc_sentence->Sharpened teeth glint alongside ravenous eyes from inside the crevices of the floor and wall of the piece.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellReanimator.label: reanimator
LanguageData.Cults_SpellReanimator.rulePack.rulesStri: tale_noun->the time [pawn_nameFull] rose from the dead
image->[pawn_nameFull] stands to the shock of an audience
desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] smiles unnaturally with a vacant look in [pawn_possessive] eyes.
desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] is pointing a single finger at [pawn_possessive] executioner.
desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] has green tinted skin with narrow slits for irises.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellReincarnation.label: reincarnation
LanguageData.Cults_SpellReincarnation.rulePack.rulesS: tale_noun->the time [pawn_nameFull] transformed into a tree of madness
image->[pawn_nameFull]'s has split apart at the base of a nightmarish tree
circumstance_phrase-> bearing [pawn_possessive] body parts strewn about its branches
desc_sentence->The tree stands taller than any in the region.
desc_sentence->The front of the tree is covered in bizarre script that radiates raw energy.
desc_sentence->The tree's branches are curled in spirals that seem to bend the space around it.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarryWisdom.label: starry wisdom
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarryWisdom.rulePack.rulesSt: tale_noun->the time [pawn_nameFull]'s mind was touched by Nyarlathotep
image->[pawn_nameFull] is kneeling before a figure
circumstance_phrase->robed in the regalia of ancient egyptian pharaohs
circumstance_phrase->with the horns of a goat
desc_sentence->The figure is laying some kind of scepter upon [pawn_nameShortDef]'s forehead.
desc_sentence->The figure holds a blackened mask in one hand.
desc_sentence->[pawn_nameShortDef] is surrounded by eager spectators.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarVampireVisit.label: star vampire visit
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarVampireVisit.rulePack.rul: tale_noun->the time a star vampire crossed into our dimension
image->A massive portal opens behind the altar where a star vampire has started to grasp the preacher with its thick tentacles
circumstance_phrase->to the horror of everyone present
circumstance_phrase->to the glee of the spectators
desc_sentence->The star vampire is visible only through the blood of its victim.
desc_sentence->The victim's face is twisted towards the maw of the beast and raising a hand in protest while the other is gripped by strong tentacles.
desc_sentence->One of the spectators, bemused, is trying to draw the monster during the commotion.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSunkenShip.label: sunken ship
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSunkenShip.rulePack.rulesStri: tale_noun->the time a seaworthy ship dropped from the skies
image->A massive portal opens from the sky, reflecting an entire ocean behind it, as a chunk of ship falls through
circumstance_phrase->to the horror of everyone present
circumstance_phrase->to the glee of the spectators
desc_sentence->The ancient wreck looks colossal in size.
desc_sentence->Inside it are countless glittering gems, glinting coins, and other treasures lost from an ancient past.
desc_sentence->Two colossal anchors cross in front of the wreck.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSleeperOfNKai.label: sleeper of n'kai
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSleeperOfNKai.rulePack.rulesS: tale_noun->the time Tsathoggua granted us an idol
image->Tsathoggua sits in perpetual motionlessness with an aura of divine sloth
circumstance_phrase->and from its ichor oozed upwards from the earth came a small sculpture
circumstance_phrase->and tendris of is shapeless servants carried forth a small idol in his image through the earth
desc_sentence->The totem appears like a squat, fat toad-like creature with features of a bat and sloth.
desc_sentence->Behind the eyes of the totem can be seen a field of skulls beneath an unmoving god.
desc_sentence->The divine Tsathoggua beckons for more sacrifices with a gaping maw and searching tongue.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBlackIchor.label: black ichor
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBlackIchor.rulePack.rulesStri: tale_noun->the time Tsathoggua squeezed its black ichor into our realm
image->Tsathoggua sits in perpetual motionlessness with an aura of divine sloth
circumstance_phrase->and from its gaping maw, the black ichor trailed down its tongue
circumstance_phrase->and from its claws gripping tighly crushed skulls, black ichor oozed out of the cracks
desc_sentence->The ichor runs through the earth like lightning striking the world, and fills our colony with sustenance.
desc_sentence->The ichor makes a sloppy black fountain, pooling semi-solid ooze into edible clumps.
desc_sentence->The divine Tsathoggua waits for furher sacrifices bearing an expression of both hunger and divine sloth.
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.label: rode byakhee
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[pawn_nameFull] soaring through the skies upon a Byakhee [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[pawn_nameFull] sailing through the clouds on a Byakhee [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: circumstance_phrase->in a plume of wind and dust
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: circumstance_phrase->with the Byakhee roaring with an alien tongue
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] is concentrating intently on the reins
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] has [pawn_possessive] eyes closed and looks afraid.
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] is unconscious, [pawn_possessive] tongue lolling out, drool dripping.
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] is smiling with grim joy.
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] seems to have no idea what [pawn_pronoun] is doing.
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.15: desc_sentence->[pawn_pronoun] is strapped in with [pawn_possessive] eyes closed, totally helpless.
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.16: desc_sentence->The hune within the Byakhee burns with unnatural colors that match its heartless eyes.
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.17: desc_sentence->A nearby [animal] is looking up, startled.
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.18: desc_sentence->A [animal] is fleeing the Byakhee in fear.
LanguageData.RodeByakhee.rulePack.rulesStrings.19: desc_sentence->There is a [terrainfeature] in the background.
